name: Red Titans
description:
You are the best pilot, survivor, this is your last mission and everything will be finished. But in the middle of the mission, strange ships appear, a greater threat has arrived and the conflict seems to change course, now you are no longer fighting for a nation, it is the beginning of something much bigger and now you are the first defense barrier without even know.

FEATURES:

! 6 frantic stages
! 5 Epic bosses at the end of the stage
! Beautiful hand drawn pixel art environment
! A retro 3:4 resolution (vertical shoot em up)
! A challenging path without contines

RED TITANS is a single player vertical shoot em up, you will have to end the threat by creating a strategy with the available resources, you will have to be very skillful since there are no continues, but you will be able to recover lives at certain times.
